   19: %%
   20: -module(cfg_error_8_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   28: %% Info = [tuple()]
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: suite() ->
   31:     [{timetrap,{seconds,2}}].
   32: 
   33: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   35: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   36: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   37: %% Reason = term()
   38: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   39: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   40:     Config.
   41: 
   42: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   44: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   47:     ok.
   48: 
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   51: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   52: %% GroupName = atom()
   53: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   54: %% Reason = term()
   55: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: init_per_group(g1, Config) ->
   57:     exit({init_per_group_fails,g1}),
   58:     Config;
   59: init_per_group(g2, Config) ->
   60:     ct:comment("init_per_group(g2) timeout"),
   61:     ct:sleep(5000),
   62:     Config;
   63: init_per_group(g3, _Config) ->
   64:     badmatch = 42;
   65: init_per_group(g4, _Config) ->
   66:     ok;
   67: init_per_group(g6, Config) ->
   68:     exit({sub_group_failed,g6}),
   69:     Config;
   70: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   71:     Config.
   72:     
   73: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   75: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   76: %% GroupName = atom()
   77: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   78: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   79: end_per_group(g11, _Config) ->
   80:     exit({end_per_group_fails,g5}),
   81:     ok;
   82: end_per_group(g12, _Config) ->
   83:     ct:comment("end_per_group(g6) timeout"),
   84:     ct:sleep(5000),
   85:     ok;
   86: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   87:     ok.
   88: 
   89: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   90: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   91: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   92: %% TestCase = atom()
   93: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   94: %% Reason = term()
   95: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   96: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   97:     Config.
   98: 
   99: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  100: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
  101: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
  102: %% TestCase = atom()
  103: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  104: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  105: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  106:     ok.
  107: 
  108: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  109: %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
  110: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
  111: %% GroupName = atom()
  112: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
  113: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  114: %% TestCase = atom()
  115: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
  116: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
  117: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  118: %% N = integer() | forever
  119: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  120: groups() ->
  121:     [{g1,[],[tc1]},
  122:      {g2,[],[tc1]},
  123:      {g3,[],[tc1]},
  124:      {g4,[],[tc1]},
  125:      {g5,[],[tc1,{g6,[],[tc2]},tc3]},
  126:      {g11,[],[tc1]},
  127:      {g12,[],[tc1]}].
  128: 
  129: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  130: %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  131: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  132: %% GroupName = atom()
  133: %% TestCase = atom()
  134: %% Reason = term()
  135: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  136: all() -> 
  137:     [{group,g1},
  138:      {group,g2},
  139:      {group,g3},
  140:      {group,g4},
  141:      {group,g5},
  142:      {group,g11},
  143:      {group,g12}
  144:     ].
  145: 
  146: tc1(_) ->
  147:     ok.
  148: 
  149: tc2(_) ->
  150:     ok.
  151: 
  152: tc3(_) ->
  153:     ok.
